widgets.title: Welcome Message
widgets.content:
üåü Welcome to WellSphere - Your Intelligent Wellness Companion! 

This comprehensive wellness tracker is designed to support your holistic wellbeing journey:

üéØ Track your daily mood, energy, and physical wellness
üí´ Get personalized insights and gentle guidance
üíß Monitor sleep, hydration, and mindfulness
üå± Set and achieve meaningful wellness goals
‚ù§Ô∏è Access stress management and emotional support tools

Start with your daily check-in below, and let's work together toward your wellness goals. Remember, every small step counts on your journey to better health!

widgets.title: Quick Navigation
widgets.content:
‚ö° Module Quick Links:
‚Ä¢ Core Check-In (Morning/Evening)
‚Ä¢ Physical Wellness Tracking
‚Ä¢ Mental & Social Check-In
‚Ä¢ Goals & Habits Review
‚Ä¢ Analytics Dashboard

Use Module Visibility Settings to customize your experience.

widgets.title: Check-in Time
widgets.placeholder: What time is it? (Use 24-hour format, e.g. 14:30)

widgets.title: Mood Tracker
widgets.placeholder: How are you feeling right now? Select the option that best describes your emotional state...

widgets.title: Daily Check-In
widgets.placeholder:
Share how you're feeling today. For example:

‚Ä¢ Physical: 'My energy is low, slight headache, shoulders tense'
‚Ä¢ Mental: 'Feeling focused but a bit anxious about work'
‚Ä¢ Sleep: 'Woke up twice, feel somewhat rested'
‚Ä¢ Changes: 'Better than yesterday, less neck pain'

Be as detailed as you'd like...

widgets.title: Energy Level Tracker
options: High Energy - Very Active and Alert
Very Low Energy - Need Significant Rest
widgets.placeholder: How would you rate your current energy level?

widgets.title: Sleep Quality
widgets.placeholder: How would you rate your sleep quality?

widgets.title: Sleep Hours
widgets.placeholder: How many hours did you sleep last night?

widgets.title: Activity Log
widgets.placeholder:
Examples of activities to log:

‚Ä¢ Morning yoga - 20 mins, gentle intensity
‚Ä¢ Walking meeting - 30 mins, moderate pace
‚Ä¢ Gardening - 45 mins, light activity
‚Ä¢ Evening stretch - 10 mins, gentle

Include type, duration, and intensity level...

widgets.title: Pain/Discomfort Level
widgets.placeholder: Rate your current pain/discomfort level

widgets.title: Pain Location
widgets.placeholder:
Describe location and type of discomfort. For example:

'Dull ache in lower back'
'Sharp pain in right shoulder'
'Stiff neck, both sides'
'Tension headache, temples area'

widgets.title: Mood Pattern Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Analyze current mood metrics and patterns:

1. Current Status:
- Mood selection: [Mood Tracker]
- Detailed context: [Daily Check-In]
- Energy correlation: [Energy Level Tracker]

2. Contributing Factors:
- Sleep quality: [Sleep Quality]
- Physical state: [Pain/Discomfort Level]
- Activity level: [Activity Log]

3. Pattern Analysis:
- Time of day impact
- Activity-mood relationships
- Sleep-mood correlations

4. Tracking Focus:
- Key mood indicators
- Related metrics to monitor
- Measurement frequency

Focus on quantifiable patterns and trackable data points.

widgets.title: Sleep Metrics Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Analyze sleep-related data points:

1. Core Metrics:
- Duration: [Sleep Hours] hours
- Quality rating: [Sleep Quality]
- Energy impact [Energy Level Tracker]

2. Contributing Factors:
- Physical activity level [Activity Log]
- Pain/discomfort [Pain/Discomfort Level]
- Evening routine [Self-Care Activities]

3. Pattern Analysis:
- Sleep-mood correlations
- Activity-sleep relationships
- Environmental factors

4. Tracking Focus:
- Key sleep metrics
- Environmental variables
- Behavioral indicators

Provide data-based analysis and identify key tracking points.

widgets.title: Pain Pattern Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Analyze pain/discomfort patterns and related metrics:

1. Current Status:
- Pain level: [Pain/Discomfort Level]
- Location: [Pain Location]
- Timing and duration

2. Related Metrics:
- Activity impact [Activity Log]
- Sleep quality effect [Sleep Quality]
- Energy level correlation [Energy Level Tracker]

3. Pattern Identification:
- Activity-pain relationships
- Time-of-day patterns
- Environmental factors

4. Tracking Points:
- Key pain indicators
- Related metrics to monitor
- Measurement frequency

Focus on data patterns and measurable indicators.

widgets.title: Physical Wellness Module
widgets.content:
üí™ Physical Wellness Tracking
Monitor your physical activity, hydration, nutrition, and rest patterns throughout the day.

widgets.title: Daily Steps
widgets.placeholder: How many steps have you taken today?

widgets.title: Water Intake
widgets.placeholder: How many glasses of water have you had today?

widgets.title: Daily Progress Tracker
widgets.prompt:
Generate a visual progress report for today at [Check-in Time]:

‚è∞ Time Context Analysis:
Based on check-in time, suggest optimal timing for remaining wellness activities.

üåä Hydration Progress
Target: 12 glasses | Current: [Water Intake]
Progress: (‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚ó¶‚ó¶) ([Water Intake]/12 * 100)%
Suggested timing for next intake based on current time

üë£ Step Count Progress
Target: 10000 steps | Current: [Daily Steps]
Progress: (‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚ó¶‚ó¶‚ó¶) ([Daily Steps]/10000 * 100)%
Recommended walking times based on [Energy Level Tracker]

üßò Mindfulness Progress
Target: 30 min | Current: [Mindfulness Minutes]
Progress: (‚Ä¢‚ó¶‚ó¶‚ó¶‚ó¶) ([Mindfulness Minutes]/30 * 100)%
Suggested mindfulness breaks aligned with energy patterns

üî• Activity Streak
Habit Status: [Wellness Habit Tracker]

Provide encouraging feedback based on today's progress and time-optimized suggestions for remaining goals.

widgets.title: Mindfulness Minutes
widgets.placeholder: How many minutes did you spend on mindfulness/meditation today?

widgets.title: Meal Journal
widgets.placeholder:
Example of a daily food log:

8am: Oatmeal with berries, green tea
10:30am: Apple and almonds
1pm: Quinoa salad with chickpeas
3pm: Greek yogurt with honey
6:30pm: Grilled salmon, roasted vegetables

Include timing and portions if you'd like...

widgets.title: Module Visibility Settings
widgets.placeholder: Choose which modules to display...

widgets.title: Physical Wellness & Hydration Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Analyze physical wellness metrics tracked today:

1. Activity Metrics:
- Exercise details from [Activity Log]
- Step count: [Daily Steps]
- Activity intensity patterns
- Movement frequency

2. Recovery Indicators:
- Sleep duration: [Sleep Hours]
- Sleep quality: [Sleep Quality]
- Pain/discomfort: [Pain/Discomfort Level]
- Reported symptoms: [Symptom Timeline]

3. Hydration Analysis:
- Current intake: [Water Intake] glasses
- Time-based recommendations:
  ‚Ä¢ Morning (before 10am): 2-3 glasses
  ‚Ä¢ Midday (10am-2pm): 3-4 glasses
  ‚Ä¢ Afternoon (2pm-6pm): 3-4 glasses
  ‚Ä¢ Evening (after 6pm): 2-3 glasses
- Activity-adjusted targets
- Next recommended hydration time

4. Wellness Markers:
- Nutrition patterns: [Meal Journal]
- Energy level: [Energy Level Tracker]
- Medication adherence: [Medication Tracker]

5. Action Items:
- Key metrics to monitor
- Specific timing for next water intake
- Suggested movement based on current state

Provide analysis based on tracked data and identify specific metrics to focus on.

widgets.title: Nutrition & Mood Tracking Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Analyze tracked nutrition and mood data:

1. Nutrition Tracking:
- Meal timing and patterns from [Meal Journal]
- Hydration status: [Water Intake] glasses
- Meal-mood correlations

2. Mood Metrics:
- Current mood: [Mood Tracker]
- Energy level: [Energy Level Tracker]
- Sleep quality impact: [Sleep Quality]

3. Pattern Analysis:
- Timing of meals vs energy levels
- Hydration and mood correlation
- Sleep-nutrition-mood connections

4. Data Points to Track:
- Key nutrition metrics
- Mood indicators
- Notable patterns

Focus on data patterns and measurable indicators.

widgets.title: Goals & Habits Module
widgets.content:
üéØ Goals & Habits
Set meaningful goals, track your progress, and build lasting healthy habits.

widgets.title: Daily Goal
widgets.placeholder:
Set a specific, achievable goal for today. Examples:

‚Ä¢ '3 x 5-min walking breaks during work'
‚Ä¢ '8 glasses of water, tracked hourly'
‚Ä¢ '10-min morning meditation before email'
‚Ä¢ 'Stretch routine during lunch break'
‚Ä¢ 'Screen-free wind-down 30 mins before bed'

widgets.title: Goal Status
widgets.placeholder: Update your goal status...

widgets.title: Wellness Habit Tracker
widgets.placeholder: Select which habits you completed today

widgets.title: Goal Support
widgets.prompt:
Analyze the wellness goal [Daily Goal] in context of today's tracking data:

1. Goal Analysis:
- Connection to current metrics
- Alignment with energy level [Energy Level Tracker]
- Consideration of physical state [Pain/Discomfort Level]

2. Implementation Plan:
- Specific steps based on current state
- Timing aligned with energy patterns
- Adjustments needed based on tracked symptoms

3. Progress Integration:
- How this goal connects to tracked habits [Wellness Habit Tracker]
- Relation to overall wellness metrics
- Impact on identified health patterns

4. Success Strategy:
- Specific checkpoints for tracking
- Measurable indicators of progress
- When/how to log completion

Focus on measurable actions and trackable outcomes.

widgets.title: Goal Progress Metrics
widgets.prompt:
Analyze goal progress metrics:

1. Goal Status:
- Current goal: [Daily Goal]
- Progress state: [Goal Status]
- Completion markers

2. Related Metrics:
- Energy level: [Energy Level Tracker]
- Physical state: [Pain/Discomfort Level]
- Activity data: [Activity Log]

3. Pattern Analysis:
- Time-based progress patterns
- Success rate indicators
- Obstacle frequency

4. Tracking Points:
- Progress indicators
- Measurement frequency
- Key checkpoints

Focus on measurable progress and trackable milestones.

widgets.title: Habit Metrics Dashboard
widgets.prompt:
Analyze habit completion metrics:

üìä Daily Tracking
‚Ä¢ Water: [Water Intake]/20 glasses complete
‚Ä¢ Mindfulness: [Mindfulness Minutes]/180 min complete
‚Ä¢ Sleep: [Sleep Hours]/8 hours achieved
‚Ä¢ Steps: [Daily Steps]/10000 complete

üìà Completion Analysis
‚Ä¢ Today's Habits: [Wellness Habit Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Activity Status: [Activity Log]
‚Ä¢ Self-Care: [Self-Care Activities]

üìâ Pattern Recognition
‚Ä¢ Most Consistent Habits
‚Ä¢ Completion Time Patterns
‚Ä¢ Success Rate Analysis

Display numerical completion rates and statistical patterns.

widgets.title: Medication Tracker
widgets.placeholder: Track your medication status for today

widgets.title: Symptom Timeline
widgets.placeholder:
Track symptoms with timing and intensity. For example:

9am: Mild headache started
11am: Headache increased to moderate
2pm: Added slight nausea
4pm: Headache improved after water and break

Include any patterns or triggers you notice...

widgets.title: Stress & Energy Metrics Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Analyze stress and energy data patterns:

1. Current Indicators:
- Mood state: [Mood Tracker]
- Energy level: [Energy Level Tracker]
- Physical markers: [Pain/Discomfort Level]

2. Contributing Metrics:
- Sleep data: [Sleep Hours], [Sleep Quality]
- Activity level: [Activity Log]
- Mindfulness practice: [Mindfulness Minutes]

3. Pattern Identification:
- Time-based variations
- Activity-stress correlations
- Recovery indicators

4. Measurement Focus:
- Key stress markers
- Energy level tracking points
- Pattern monitoring intervals

Emphasize data patterns and measurable indicators.

widgets.title: Mental & Social Wellness Module
widgets.content:
üß† Mental & Social Wellness
Track your emotional well-being, social connections, and self-care practices.

widgets.title: Social Connection Check
widgets.placeholder: How connected did you feel to others today?

widgets.title: Daily Wellness Journey
widgets.prompt:
Create a timeline of today's wellness journey:

üåÖ Morning Check-in at [Check-in Time]
Feeling: Current mood from [Mood Tracker]
Energy: Current level from [Energy Level Tracker]

üåû Daily Activities & Progress
Physical: [Daily Steps] steps walked
Wellness: [Water Intake] glasses of water
Mindful: [Mindfulness Minutes] minutes of practice

üåÉ Evening Status
Goal Progress: Current status from [Goal Status]
Social Wellness: Current level from [Social Connection Check]
Self-Care: Latest activity from [Self-Care Activities]

Highlight key achievements and suggest optimal timing for remaining activities.

widgets.title: Self-Care Activities
widgets.placeholder:
Examples of self-care activities to log:

‚Ä¢ 15-min morning reading with herbal tea
‚Ä¢ Relaxing bath with lavender oil
‚Ä¢ 10-min mindful garden time
‚Ä¢ Called a friend for support
‚Ä¢ Evening stretching routine
‚Ä¢ Practiced deep breathing
‚Ä¢ Journaling before bed

widgets.title: Social Connection Metrics
widgets.prompt:
Track and analyze social wellness metrics:

1. Connection Data:
- Current level: [Social Connection Check]
- Related mood state: [Mood Tracker]
- Energy correlation: [Energy Level Tracker]

2. Activity Patterns:
- Social components in [Self-Care Activities]
- Time-of-day patterns
- Duration and frequency

3. Impact Analysis:
- Effect on mood trends
- Correlation with energy levels
- Relationship to sleep quality

4. Measurement Points:
- Key social indicators
- Optimal tracking times
- Success metrics

Focus on measurable patterns and trackable outcomes.

widgets.title: Self-Care Activity Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Analyze self-care activities and their impacts:

1. Activity Tracking:
- Activities logged: [Self-Care Activities]
- Duration and timing patterns
- Frequency of different types

2. Impact Metrics:
- Effect on mood [Mood Tracker]
- Energy level changes [Energy Level Tracker]
- Sleep quality correlation [Sleep Quality]

3. Pattern Analysis:
- Most frequent activities
- Time-of-day patterns
- Activity-outcome correlations

4. Measurement Points:
- Key indicators to track
- Optimal tracking times
- Success metrics

Focus on identifying patterns and measurable outcomes.

widgets.title: Energy Pattern Insights
widgets.prompt:
Analyze energy-related metrics from today's tracking:

1. Current Metrics:
- Energy level: [Energy Level Tracker]
- Sleep data: [Sleep Hours] hours, [Sleep Quality]
- Physical activity: [Activity Log]
- Hydration: [Water Intake] glasses

2. Pattern Identification:
- Time-based energy fluctuations
- Activity impact on energy
- Sleep-energy correlation

3. Contributing Factors:
- Nutrition timing [Meal Journal]
- Physical discomfort [Pain/Discomfort Level]
- Mood state [Mood Tracker]

4. Tracking Recommendations:
- Key energy indicators to monitor
- Optimal measurement times
- Metrics needing closer attention

Focus on quantifiable patterns and trackable metrics.

widgets.title: Insights & Analytics Module
widgets.content:
üìä Wellness Insights
Comprehensive analysis of your wellness data, patterns, and trends.

widgets.title: Visual Wellness Dashboard
widgets.prompt:
Create a visual wellness snapshot:

üèπ Today's Core Metrics
‚Ä¢ Rest: [Sleep Hours]h sleep ([Sleep Quality])
‚Ä¢ Movement: [Daily Steps]/10000 steps
‚Ä¢ Mindfulness: [Mindfulness Minutes]/30min
‚Ä¢ Hydration: [Water Intake]/12 glasses

üìà Current Status (1-5 scale)
‚Ä¢ Energy Level: Current level from [Energy Level Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Emotional State: Current mood from [Mood Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Physical Comfort: Current level from [Pain/Discomfort Level]
‚Ä¢ Social Wellbeing: Current level from [Social Connection Check]

üéØ Progress Overview
‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: Current goal from [Daily Goal]
‚Ä¢ Status: Current status from [Goal Status]
‚Ä¢ Habits: Current status from [Wellness Habit Tracker]

Display key metrics with completion percentages.

widgets.title: Metric Correlation Dashboard
widgets.prompt:
Track key metric relationships and patterns:

üìä Activity Correlations
‚Ä¢ Steps/Energy: [Daily Steps] ‚Üí [Energy Level Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Exercise/Mood: [Activity Log] ‚Üí [Mood Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Mindfulness/Stress: [Mindfulness Minutes] impact

üìà Wellness Links
‚Ä¢ Sleep/Mood: [Sleep Hours], [Sleep Quality] ‚Üí [Mood Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Hydration/Energy: [Water Intake] ‚Üí [Energy Level Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Pain/Activity: [Pain/Discomfort Level] vs [Activity Log]

üîÑ 24h Changes
‚Ä¢ Metric Shifts: Track daily variations
‚Ä¢ Pattern Changes: Note disruptions
‚Ä¢ Risk Indicators: Flag significant changes

Focus on quantifiable correlations.

widgets.title: Weekly Progress Summary
widgets.prompt:
Summarize this week's top achievements and areas for focus:

üèÜ Top 3 Wins
1. Based on [Goal Status] and [Wellness Habit Tracker]
2. Improvements in [Mood Tracker] and [Energy Level Tracker]
3. Progress in [Daily Steps], [Water Intake], or [Mindfulness Minutes]

üí° Focus Area
‚Ä¢ Identify one key area from tracked metrics that needs attention
‚Ä¢ Suggest specific, actionable steps for improvement

üìä Week-over-Week Changes
‚Ä¢ Compare current metrics to previous week
‚Ä¢ Note significant improvements or changes
‚Ä¢ Highlight consistent patterns

Keep focus on measurable progress and actionable insights.

widgets.title: Personalized Recommendations
widgets.prompt:
Based on your patterns from [Check-in Time], [Mood Tracker], and [Energy Level Tracker]:

‚è∞ Optimal Timing Suggestions
‚Ä¢ Best time for exercise: Based on [Energy Level Tracker]
‚Ä¢ Ideal check-in times: Pattern from [Check-in Time]
‚Ä¢ Strategic breaks: Based on [Pain/Discomfort Level]

üéØ Customized Goals
‚Ä¢ Suggested targets based on your patterns
‚Ä¢ Adjustments to current [Daily Goal]
‚Ä¢ New habits to consider

üí´ Module Focus
Recommend which modules deserve more attention based on:
‚Ä¢ Recent metrics
‚Ä¢ Pattern analysis
‚Ä¢ Goal progress

Provide specific, actionable recommendations.

widgets.title: Movement Suggestion
widgets.prompt:
Based on the user's current state:

Mood: [Mood Tracker]
Energy Level: [Energy Level Tracker]
Pain/Discomfort: [Pain/Discomfort Level]
Pain Location: [Pain Location]

Suggest a gentle, appropriate movement or physical activity that could help in this moment. Consider:

1. Current energy level
2. Any pain or discomfort
3. Emotional state
4. Time of day

Provide a specific, achievable suggestion with estimated duration and intensity level. Include modifications if needed.

widgets.title: Reflection & Gratitude Journal
widgets.placeholder:
Take a moment to reflect. Examples:

Thoughts & Feelings:
‚Ä¢ 'Feeling proud of maintaining my water intake goal'
‚Ä¢ 'Concerned about upcoming presentation'

Gratitude:
‚Ä¢ 'Grateful for my morning walk in sunshine'
‚Ä¢ 'Thankful for supportive message from friend'

Kindness:
‚Ä¢ 'Helped colleague with project'
‚Ä¢ 'Sent encouraging text to sister'

Share as much or as little as you'd like...

widgets.title: Reflection & Gratitude Analysis
widgets.prompt:
Based on the user's journal entry [Reflection & Gratitude Journal] and current metrics:

Mood: [Mood Tracker]
Energy: [Energy Level Tracker]
Social Connection: [Social Connection Check]
Time of Day: Current

Offer a thoughtful response that:

1. Emotional Insight
- Acknowledges expressed feelings
- Identifies potential patterns
- Notes connections to tracked wellness data

2. Gratitude Perspective
- Highlights grateful elements shared
- Connects gratitude to current wellness state
- Suggests ways to build on positive aspects

3. Kindness & Connection
- Notes any mentioned acts of kindness
- Suggests one simple kind action for today
- Links to social connection data

4. Forward Movement
- Offers one small, manageable next step
- Connects to existing goals [Daily Goal]
- Provides specific timing or context

Keep the tone warm and supportive while maintaining connection to tracked wellness data.

widgets.title: Mini Meditation & Breathing Guide
widgets.prompt:
Create a brief 1-3 minute meditation or breathing exercise based on:

Current Mood: [Mood Tracker]
Energy Level: [Energy Level Tracker]
Pain Status: [Pain/Discomfort Level]
Stress Indicators: Time of day and tracked patterns

Provide:
1. A Structured Brief Practice
- Specific breathing pattern (e.g., 4-4-4 box breathing or 4-7-8 calming breath)
- Clear timing for each phase
- Gentle postural guidance

2. Mindful Awareness Elements
- Body scan elements if relevant
- Grounding techniques
- Present-moment anchors

3. Customization Options
- Seated or lying down variations
- Modifications for current pain/discomfort
- Energy-level appropriate adjustments

Keep instructions clear, gentle, and time-specific. Format as a simple step-by-step guide that can be done anywhere.
